summary: Investigated oklch relative color syntax as alternative to color-mix for 5 non-keyframe uses

Evaluated browser support: color-mix 97%+, relative color syntax 92%+ (both sufficient)
Decision: No changes - converting 5 of 189 uses would create inconsistency with zero functional benefit
